text: 崖の村にはそんな大きな魔物が出ているの
translation: There's such a big monster appearing in the Aerie?

text: そうなんです今の僕じゃ追い払うのが精一杯でした
translation: Yes, with my current abilities, driving it away was all I could manage.

vocabulary.meaning: all one can, to the best of one's ability

grammar: 〜のが精一杯 means 'doing ~ is all I can manage'.

text: 武器をもっと強くする方法はないですか / それならロボット山の方で取れる金属で武器を強化できるって聞いたことあるわ
translation: Isn't there a way to make my weapon stronger? / In that case, I've heard you can strengthen weapons with metal from Junk Heap.

text: 山の入り口にある商店でやってくれるはずよ / わかった尋ねてみます
translation: The shop at the mountain entrance should do it for you. / Got it, I'll go ask.

text: 教科にはお金が必要だから用意を忘れないでね
translation: You'll need money for the upgrade, so don't forget to prepare it.

text: 1000ゴールドくらいだと思うけど
translation: I think it's around 1000 gold.

text: ロボット山とはどのようなところなのだ
translation: What kind of place is Junk Heap?

text: 昔の遺跡が埋まっている場所なんだって / 僕たちにはよくわからない鉄屑だらけのところだよ
translation: They say it's a place where ancient ruins are buried. / To us, it's just a place full of scrap metal we don't understand.

text: 北東の鉄橋を登ったところにあるんだ / あの橋の上を昔は大きな鉄の箱が走ってたんだって
translation: It's located past the iron bridge to the northeast. / They say big iron boxes used to run on that bridge long ago.

text: ポポルさんが言ってた
translation: That's what Popola said.

text: 昔の人間は賢かったようだな
translation: The people of old seem to have been wise.

text: 本当に賢かったら滅びかけたりはしないと思うけども
translation: I think if they were really wise, they wouldn't have nearly gone extinct.
grammar: 〜かける means 'to nearly do ~' or 'to be about to ~'.

text: 兄ちゃんお腹すいたよ
translation: Big brother, I'm hungry.
grammar: お腹がすいた is the common expression for 'I'm hungry'.

text: そっかちょっと待ってろよ
translation: Is that so? Wait a moment.

text: 確かこっちの棚に
translation: I'm sure it's on this shelf...

vocabulary.meaning: I'm sure, if I remember correctly

text: こんにちは
translation: Hello.

text: いらっしゃいます / いらっしゃいってここお店なの?
translation: Welcome! / 'Welcome'? Is this a shop?

text: はい / と言っても今はできないんだけど
translation: Yes. / Though I can't do business right now.

text: 普段は奥にあるロボット山から金属を掘ってきて
translation: Normally, we dig up metal from Junk Heap in the back...

text: 加工して売ってるんです / ロボット山で?
translation: ...and process it to sell. / From Junk Heap?

text: ええ、そうです / 昔は軍事基地だったらしくて / いい素材がたくさんあるんですよ
translation: Yes, that's right. / It seems it was a military base long ago. / There's lots of good material there.

text: ちょっと危ない場所なんですが / 背に腹は変えられないというか
translation: It's a bit dangerous, but... / you know, necessity knows no law.

vocabulary.word: 背に腹は変えられない
vocabulary.reading: せにはらはかえられない

grammar: 背に腹は変えられない is a proverb meaning 'when you're desperate, you can't be choosy'.

text: 君たち二人だけでやってるの?
translation: Are you two running this by yourselves?

text: 父さんは弟が幼い頃に死にました
translation: Our father died when my brother was young.

text: 母さんは仕入れに出かけてます
translation: Our mother went out to get supplies.

text: お母さんもうこれだけ帰ってきてない
translation: Mom hasn't come back for this many days already.

text: 1週間も? / 最近は奥の方まで行かなきゃ
translation: A whole week? / Lately you have to go deep inside...

text: 素材が手に入らないらしくて / お兄ちゃん
translation: ...or you can't get materials, apparently. / Big brother...

text: お腹すいたってば / 素材さえあれば武器の加工ができるんだよね
translation: I said I'm hungry! / So if you have the materials, you can upgrade weapons, right?
grammar: 〜さえあれば means 'if only there is ~' or 'as long as there is ~'.

text: ええでも山の中は危険で僕らだけじゃ
translation: Yes, but inside the mountain is dangerous, and just the two of us...

text: じゃあ素材は僕が取ってくるよ / え
translation: Then I'll go get the materials. / Huh?

vocabulary.meaning: to go get and bring back

text: ちょっと僕の武器も強化してもらいたいし
translation: I want to have my weapon upgraded too, after all.

vocabulary.reading: きょうかしてもらいたい

text: それにここで働くには素材がもっと必要でしょ
translation: Besides, you need more materials to work here, right?

text: それはそうですが / じゃあ決まりどんな素材が必要
translation: That's true, but... / Then it's settled. What materials do you need?

text: その武器でしたらチタン合金が3つ必要ですね
translation: For that weapon, you'll need 3 titanium alloys.

text: ロボット山の中にいる防衛ロボットたちから入手することができます
translation: You can obtain them from the defense robots inside Junk Heap.

text: 分かった / あとこれロボット山の地図です
translation: Got it. / Also, here's a map of Junk Heap.

text: 複雑なんで必要だと思います / 気をつけてくださいね本当に危ないですから
translation: It's complex, so I think you'll need it. / Please be careful, it's really dangerous.

text: 明るいな / ここはまだ昔の機械が動いてるんだね
translation: It's bright. / The old machines are still running here.

text: 僕たちには何が何だかさっぱりだけどね
translation: We have no idea what any of this is, though.
grammar: 何が何だかさっぱり分からない is a set phrase meaning 'have no clue whatsoever'.

text: 旧世界の廃墟か / それを機械たちが永遠と守っているわけだ
translation: Ruins of the old world, huh. / So the machines have been guarding it forever.

text: 珍しい素材を持ってそうだね
translation: They seem to have rare materials.

text: 素材はこのくらいで十分かな
translation: This much material should be enough, I think.

text: 依頼されたものを集め終わった後って、一気に依頼主のところまでワープしたくなるんだね。
translation: After collecting what was requested, you just want to warp directly to the client, don't you?

text: ワープ? / そういう名前の遠くまで一気に飛べる魔法があるって聞いたんだけど。
translation: Warp? / I heard there's a magic by that name that lets you fly far away instantly.

text: ああ、あれはやめておいたほうがいい。 / どうして?
translation: Ah, you should avoid that. / Why?

vocabulary.word: やめておいた方がいい
vocabulary.reading: やめておいたほうがいい

grammar: 〜ておいた方がいい is advice meaning 'you'd better do ~'.

text: 何人もの賢者が試そうとしたが、途中にある障害物に衝突して、みんなひき肉になったからな。
translation: Many sages tried it, but they collided with obstacles along the way and all became ground meat.

text: これはやめておいたほうがいい。
translation: You'd better not do this.

vocabulary.word: やめておいた方がいい
vocabulary.reading: やめておいたほうがいい

text: ああ、やめておけ。
translation: Yeah, don't do it.

text: 寂しいんだもん!寂しいんだもん!お母さん!
translation: I'm lonely! I'm lonely! Mom!
grammar: 〜んだもん is a childish way of explaining/justifying ('because ~!').

text: おかえりなさい。 / 素材を取ってきたよ。
translation: Welcome back. / I got the materials.

text: ありがとうございます。すぐに武器を強化しますね。
translation: Thank you. I'll upgrade your weapon right away.

text: 本当は有料なんですが、特別に今回は無料で結構です。
translation: Normally there's a fee, but this time I'll do it for free as a special case.

text: はい、どうぞ。 / これでうちも営業することができます。ありがとうございました。
translation: Here you go. / Now we can run our business too. Thank you very much.

text: お母さん!
translation: Mom!

text: どうしたの?
translation: What's wrong?

text: お騒がせしてすみません / 弟が
translation: Sorry for the commotion. / My brother...

text: 母さんを探しに行くって
translation: He said he's going to look for Mom.

text: もうちょっと待ってたら / きっと帰ってくるから
translation: If you wait a little longer, / she'll surely come back.

text: 待てよ / な / 待てない
translation: Wait, okay? / Please? / I can't wait!

text: お母さん
translation: Mom!

text: しろう / 言うな もうわかっておる
translation: Shiro... / Don't say it. I already know.
grammar: わかっておる is archaic for わかっている.

text: こやつらの母親を探せばいいのだろう
translation: We just need to find their mother, right?

text: いいですいいです そこまでしてもらったら申し訳なくて
translation: No, no, it's fine. If you do that much for us, I'd feel bad.

text: そんなの気にしないでいいよ だけど
translation: Don't worry about that. But...

text: カーソンは
translation: Carson...

text: いえ、なんでもないです。
translation: No, it's nothing.

text: いつもお母さんは山の奥の方まで入って行っています。
translation: Mom usually goes deep into the mountain.

vocabulary.reading: はいっていっています

text: エレベーターを使うと思いますから、起動パスコードをお渡ししておきます。
translation: She probably uses the elevator, so I'll give you the activation passcode.

text: さてと、あの兄弟のお母さんはロボット山の奥まで行くって言ってたかな。
translation: Now then, I think they said their mother goes deep into Junk Heap.

text: なぜそこまであの兄弟に堅いでするのだ お母さんがいない寂しさは僕たち兄弟も知っているか
translation: Why do you go so far for those brothers? / We siblings also know the loneliness of not having a mother.

text: お前は本当に信じておるのか
translation: Do you really believe it?

text: あやつらの母親が本当にこんなところまで来られたと
translation: That their mother could really come to a place like this?

text: 一週間以上もたった一人で素材を探し続けていると信じているのか?
translation: Do you believe she's been searching for materials alone for over a week?

vocabulary.reading: いっしゅうかんいじょう

text: 本当に?
translation: Really?

text: 我が思うに母親はきっともう…
translation: I think their mother is probably already...

text: 生きてるよ
translation: She's alive.

text: 信じなきゃ奇跡だって起きない / 奇跡か
translation: If you don't believe, miracles won't happen. / Miracles, huh.

text: 第3回目
translation: (Third round/attempt)

text: 潰されるでないぞ 逃げよ / 分かってる / 周囲にキューハレン 気をつけ
translation: Don't get crushed! Run! / I know! / Watch out for the surroundings!

text: 奴の影を見据えよう
translation: Let's keep our eyes on that thing's shadow.

text: よくぞやった
translation: Well done!

text: 手のかかん機関だ / またなんか違うのが出てきた / 雑魚を移送せれば先はないようだな
translation: What a troublesome machine. / Another different one appeared. / It seems there's no end to these small fry.

text: なんか来たよ
translation: Something's coming!

text: 残すはあの大頭のみだな
translation: All that's left is that big-headed one.

text: この大の爆弾が残っている
translation: These big bombs are still here.

text: 悪眼に食らえばさすがに効くではある / どこかで聞いたような戦い方だけど
translation: If you hit its weak eye, it should work. / That's a fighting style I've heard somewhere before.

text: わかった
translation: Got it.

text: 機械のなんざいで我に歩かうとは / 危ないよシロ
translation: A mere machine dares to challenge me! / Be careful, Shiro!

text: よし聞いてる / 死ぬ中か
translation: Good, it's working! / Is it dying?

text: 本当に見たままの弱点なのだな
translation: So it really is the obvious weak point.

text: 負け
translation: Defeat!

text: ТРЕВОЖНАЯ МУЗЫКА
translation: (Transcription error - Russian text)

text: 女の人
translation: A woman...

text: もう死んでる
translation: She's already dead.

text: あやつらの母親であろう
translation: That's probably their mother.

text: 一人じゃなかったんだ
translation: She wasn't alone.

text: 男か
translation: A man?

text: 大きなカバンに綺麗な洋服
translation: A big bag and nice clothes.

text: お金もある
translation: There's money too.

text: どうしてこんなところにこんなものも
translation: Why would all this be in a place like this?

text: 子供たちを捨てて / 若い男と逃げるつもりだったようだな
translation: It seems she was planning to abandon her children / and run away with a young man.

text: そんな
translation: No way...

text: 奇跡は起こらず / 最悪の真実が待っておったな
translation: The miracle didn't happen. / The worst truth was waiting.

text: あやつらには何という
translation: What should we tell them...

text: これは化粧瓶 / バラの匂い
translation: This is a perfume bottle. / The scent of roses.

text: これだけでも届けよう
translation: Let's at least deliver this.

text: お母さんは?
translation: What about Mom?

text: ごめんね / 見つけられなかったんだ
translation: I'm sorry. / I couldn't find her.

text: そんな
translation: No way...

text: どこ探したの?本当に探したの?役立たず
translation: Where did you look? Did you really look? Useless!

text: ほらせっかく皆さんがお前のために
translation: Hey, everyone went out of their way for you...

vocabulary.meaning: specially, going out of one's way

text: いいんです怒らないであげて / 僕はいつまで待ったらいいの?
translation: It's okay, don't be angry with him. / How long do I have to wait?

text: お母さん
translation: Mom...

text: 母さんは一人で死んでましたか
translation: Did Mom die alone?

text: えっと
translation: Um...

text: いいんです分かってます
translation: It's okay. I understand.

text: 教えてください / 母さんは好きな人と死ねたんですか
translation: Please tell me. / Did Mom die with the person she loved?

text: 遺体は二つあった
translation: There were two bodies.

text: よかった / 何
translation: Good. / What?

text: 母さんはもう俺たちのことでイライラしたり
translation: Mom won't have to be frustrated with us anymore...

text: 悩まなくて済むんだ / これで
translation: ...or worry about us anymore. / With this.
grammar: 〜なくて済む means 'won't have to ~' or 'can avoid doing ~'.

text: よかったと思います
translation: I think that's good.

text: 許せるの
translation: Can you forgive her?

text: 俺は母さんの子供だから
translation: Because I'm Mom's child.

text: 俺の母さんはあの人だけだから
translation: Because she's my only mother.

text: だから
translation: That's why...

text: この瓶
translation: This bottle...

text: 拾ってきたんだけど
translation: I picked it up...

text: これは
translation: This is...

text: 母さんの香水だ / 母さんの
translation: Mom's perfume. / Mom's...

text: 匂いだ
translation: ...scent.

text: こんなの / なんで涙が出るんだ
translation: Something like this... / Why are tears coming out?

text: 泣いちゃダメだ / こんなところ
translation: I can't cry. / Not in a place like this.

text: 弟に見られたら
translation: If my brother sees me...

text: くそ / くそ
translation: Damn it... Damn it...

text: これで良かったのかな
translation: Was this the right thing to do?

text: ありがとうございました / 本当に
translation: Thank you very much. / Really.

text: いろいろありがとうございました
translation: Thank you for everything.

text: これでよかったのだ / きっと
translation: This was for the best. / Surely.
